name: Bobby crane VR
description:
Bobby crane  is Oculus Quest crane simulator with educational elements  for kids. 

How to play: 

After starting the game female voice will say what item you should take. You must take it and drop on the little running creature on the right side.  

Features:

- No menu (after launching game starts without menu so it makes the game easy for kids)

- No motion sickness effect. (Children can hardly bear the movements in a virtual space, so there are no movements in the game. Therefore, the game will be played in comfort.)

- Controller and hand tracker support. You can play with controllers, but if you put them down, the hand tracker will be activated. 

- Realistic rope physics. 

- 40 mb size
